body: Please note, this is not a summer internship and is not be suitable for who are completing or have already completed their final year of study this year (2024) Currently pursuing a Bachelors, Masters or PhD in Computer Science or a related technical / engineering field, with a significant software coding component. A passion for software development Curious mindset, always able to ask questions, Proficient in TypeScript and NodeJS. An understanding of SQL, Some experience with containerization technologies such as Docker or Kubernetes, cloud providers such as AWS, GCP or Azure
